website_summaries.verdict: Very low price per ounce for a plant-based granite cleaner that's free of harsh chemicals.
pros: Works to clean and polish granite, marble, and stone surfaces
Large bottle of spray that provides a good value
Includes a fresh scent that some people like
Doesn't leave behind a residue or film
Gives you a thorough cleaning result
cons: Scent will be too strong for some people to use on their countertops

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective; sometimes chemically smelly.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for our quartz countertops, because as much as I’d like to use plain old soap, water, and a sponge, it always leaves a full residue. I’m a long time user of Method products, and while I usually gravitate toward the ones that are clear and scented with fruity things (cucumber, tangerine, etc), I bought into the marketing for stone countertops. And they GLISTEN. Shiny, shiny, shiny in a single wipe down. My only complaint is that it sometimes has an overwhelmingly chemical scent right after spraying (almost noxious and ammonia smelling) but I’m willing to live with it because I’ve come to trust the brand and its ingredients).
customer_reviews.author: A. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Toxic all natural ingredients, and the clean is NOT Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Streaky finish, not really shiny and smells quite awful. In additional their supposed all natural bio based ingredients are not all that friendly. Both myself and a friend who was staying over because their home flooded found the ingredients caused severe contact dermatitis which took weeks to resolve. At first I thought we got a bad batch but this happened twice and that's all the changes I am giving Method! Needless to say I have two mostly full bottles that are now garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Para-d

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the smell for our stone shower. It does smell very good, but the smell is not very long lasting which is a little disappointing. However, the product does keep my natural stone shower looking like new.
customer_reviews.author: Crombie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be great to use on my granite. BUT all is does is smear and it never looks clean. The smell is aweful. Very stong and weird smelling. Save your money and buy different. This stuff is just not worth it. Also it does cause dermitits is it comes into contact with your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but this is how I found it in the box, half way empty. Also states it's a non refundable item and no way to contact seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shine with a lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite granite cleaner ever! It leaves the surface streak-free and so shiny. The scent is amazing too - not nearly as strong or perfume-y as the apple scent. I’ve been using this for over a year and will never switch unless they stop making it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clean scent
customer_reviews.text: I have a granite bathroom sink countertop. I usually just use bleach or wipe down with damp cloth. I saw this brand at my nieces house and decided to try it. I LOVE the scent and how nice and bright it makes my black granite bathroom countertop. I’m now a fan of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jaamsy

customer_reviews.title: It Cleans.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many, this is a pretty good one and would recommend it. There are ones that are more expensie, but you get the same results with this cleaner. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely the best product I’ve found for cleaning our quartz countertops
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best product I’ve found for cleaning our quartz countertops. Our countertops came with a recommendation that we only use cleaning products with a safe pH, and this product complies. Smells nice. Very effective.
customer_reviews.author: emmsf

customer_reviews.title: great daily cleaner
customer_reviews.text: this has a nice light scent and i usually hate all scented products. it fades quickly and is safe for you and others, including pets for the granite cleaning. i have used it on my fridge too and works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Reality tourist

customer_reviews.title: Shines right
customer_reviews.text: Use this with microfiber cloth as a buffer. Works great. Shines my glass cooktop nicely.
customer_reviews.author: GBLady

customer_reviews.title: Smells clean
customer_reviews.text: Love the method products. This cleans my granite without leaving streaks or residue. It has a great scent and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: wendi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Fresh Scent
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner does a nice job on our counter tops, and it smells terrific! It doesn't leave an icky film on them, either.
customer_reviews.author: Llamazon

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great . Cleans and polishes counters perfect.tangerine scent is wonderful.just ordered 2 more.it cleans as it claims
customer_reviews.author: Clara Schnacke

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean well
customer_reviews.text: Not great. It doesn't clean well and although it smells ok, that's not helping with the lack of actual cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: cdiesel

customer_reviews.title: Like the assurance my counters are clean
customer_reviews.text: Makes clean up easy and assured my granite is really clean and polished.
customer_reviews.author: B. Moo

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: It smells great and really gives the granite countertops a nice shine.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Carden

customer_reviews.title: Love this for Granite
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for cleaning my granite countertops. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Codi

customer_reviews.title: Love this granite cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This Method granite cleaner makes my granite so fresh, clean and it shines so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty good on granite.
customer_reviews.text: Actually noticed granite was a lot shinier. It smells pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Better smelling than other granite/quartz cleaning products I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was thoughtfully packaged. No leakage. I love these products. Cleans and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Wondering fragrance
customer_reviews.text: so much nicer than the apple one normally found in stores, which makes me feel sick. I actually like using the tangerine one.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband is picky when it comes to cleaning smells and when he came home after I used this granite cleaner, he let me know it smelt amazing! It also works so well, just like all other Method products I have used. Ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Gaertner

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells great
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my granite counters and it works as advertised. Smells good too
customer_reviews.author: C. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I Love this stuff it makes my granite shine like new and smells very pleasant it makes my whole kitchen smells like oranges
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hollon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one smells really good, and it cleans the granite.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S

customer_reviews.title: Crazy about the orange scent and shine of my granite!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent only! Works wonderfully on all my granite surfaces!
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only item I use to clean an shine my granite. I try to purchase it at Target becasue it is cheaper than Amazon.These bottles were half the size of the ones I purchase at the store. It is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: zulu

customer_reviews.title: Polished look with a great scent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It isn't hard on the counters, it smells great, and it leaves a nice, polished look to the granite countertops.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Clean and shiny countertops!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my granite countertops. It keeps them clean and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works so well on granite and smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Non returnable
customer_reviews.text: This product came in Completely empty . They don’t take returns so I guess I just bought a beat up spray bottle that probably is cracked
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Damage product
customer_reviews.text: The product was damage. The product spilled out all over the shipping container. The bottle was empty when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning product..
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaning product. No streaks, excellent in kitchen...
customer_reviews.author: piper/NJ

customer_reviews.title: Spray gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: The spray part of the bottle was not working properly
customer_reviews.author: Olivia N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Only used soap and water for my quartz countertops which left a haze. Used Method Granite Cleaner on my quartz and it shines and thoroughly cleans. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Boesch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked really great, dries quickly and granite shines like new.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite St. Amand

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a treat it works so well you must try it!
customer_reviews.author: claudia post

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Seems to clean granite very well but it has a VERY strong scent. It gives me a headache before I can get through cleaning half of my counter tops. Once this bottle is empty, I plan to try another cleaner due to this strong smell (I've stopped using Method shower cleaner for the same reason).
customer_reviews.author: Pwrdesigner

product_meta.title: Method Daily Granite Cleaner, Orange Tangerine, 28 Ounce
product_meta.description:
It's no secret, even doughnuts look fancy on gleaming granite. Buff, polish, clean and shine. There's non need to be precious about your granite and stone. Whip up a feast - or whatever else you feel like doing on your countertops - and leave it to this non-toxic, plant-based cleaner to restore the gleam. No harsh chemicals, no nasty residue. Oh, is that your reflection? no who's precious? granite marble stone.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :10.04 x 3.54 x 3.03 inches; 1.75 Pounds
 * Date First Available :June 30, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Method
 * ASIN :B073JBZJHP

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars250 ratings It's no secret, even doughnuts look fancy on gleaming granite. Buff, polish, clean and shine. There's non need to be precious about your granite and stone. Whip up a feast - or whatever else you feel like doing on your countertops - and leave it to this non-toxic, plant-based cleaner to restore the gleam. No harsh chemicals, no nasty residue. Oh, is that your reflection? no who's precious? granite marble stone.
feature_bullets: Power green technology cuts grease + grime
